verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* prayed \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w out|strong="H1419"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w fish|strong="H1709"\w*â€™s \w belly|strong="H4578"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* said, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* called \w by|strong="H3068"\w* reason \w of|strong="H3068"\w* mine affliction \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* answered me; out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w belly|strong="H4578"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hell cried \w I|strong="H3068"\w*, \add and \add*thou heardest \w my|strong="H3068"\w* voice.

\w For|strong="H7121"\w* \w thou|strong="H8085"\w* didst \w cast|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w* into \w the|strong="H8085"\w* depth, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w heart|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* seas, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* flood \w was|strong="H3068"\w* round \w about|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*; \w all|strong="H7121"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* waves \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* billows \w passed|strong="H3068"\w* \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5437"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* said, am \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w out|strong="H7993"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w thine|strong="H5437"\w* eyes; \w yet|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3824"\w* look \w again|strong="H5674"\w* \w toward|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H5674"\w* holy temple.

\w The|strong="H3254"\w* waters compassed \w me|strong="H5048"\w* \w about|strong="H5027"\w*, \w even|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H3254"\w* soul; \w the|strong="H3254"\w* deep was \w round|strong="H5869"\w* \w about|strong="H5027"\w* \w me|strong="H5048"\w*; \w the|strong="H3254"\w* weeds \w were|strong="H5869"\w* wrapped \w about|strong="H5027"\w* \w my|strong="H5048"\w* head.

\w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w went|strong="H5437"\w* \w down|strong="H5437"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* bottoms \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* mountains; \w the|strong="H5704"\w* earth \w with|strong="H5315"\w* \w her|strong="H7218"\w* bars \add closed \add*upon \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* ever: \w yet|strong="H5704"\w* hast \w thou|strong="H5704"\w* \w brought|strong="H5437"\w* \w up|strong="H2280"\w* \w my|strong="H5704"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* pit, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5704"\w* God.

\w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul fainted \w within|strong="H1157"\w* \w me|strong="H1157"\w*, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* remembered \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* prayer \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w thee|strong="H1157"\w*, \w into|strong="H3381"\w* thine holy temple.
\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w regard|strong="H5921"\w* lying vanities forsake \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w But|strong="H5800"\w* I \w will|strong="H2617"\w* sacrifice \w unto|strong="H2617"\w* \w thee|strong="H5800"\w* with \w the|strong="H8104"\w* voice \w of|strong="H1892"\w* thanksgiving; I \w will|strong="H2617"\w* \w pay|strong="H8104"\w* \w that|strong="H7723"\w* \w which|strong="H2617"\w* I \w have|strong="H8104"\w* vowed. Salvation \w is|strong="H2617"\w* \w of|strong="H1892"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spake|strong="H3068"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fish, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H7999"\w* vomited out Jonah upon \w the|strong="H3068"\w* dry land.
